Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -1,12 +0,0 @@ - - - -

What Can JavaScript Do?

- -

JavaScript can change HTML attribute values.

- -

In this case JavaScript changes the value of the src (source) attribute of an image.

- - - - \ No newline at end of file

Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -1,1 +1,27 @@ - + + + + + + + About + + + +

About

+
+
+

Who We Are?

+

The Students Loan is a private student loan non-profit program that provides No-interest loans, sometimes called scholarship loans or interest-free loans and scholarships, which are awarded to eligible students that do not accrue interest at all. Get started by checking your loan eligibility in just 10 seconds.

+
+
+

What We Offer

+

Providing interest-free loans and scholarships for post-secondary and undergraduate education to students based on financial need has been the core function of The Student loan Hub since its creation over some decades now.

+
+
+
+

Our Vision & Mission

+

Our vision is to be the Hub that best recognizes and serves the needs of Nigerian students. We strive to provide students world-class resources to help them investigate and pursue their education, through relevant content, custom online tools, and engaging websites that offer only best-in-class products and services.

+
+ + \ No newline at end of file

+
+

We are Here to help You

+

Our mission is to provide affordable education funding options
to student nationwide

+

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
What Can JavaScript Do?

JavaScript can change HTML attribute values.

In this case JavaScript changes the value of the src (source) attribute of an image.
